New Phone

January 5th, 2008 · No Comments

I bought a new phone off eBay this week. My favorite phone of all time was my Nokia 8260 which was simple, small and lightweight, and candy bar shaped. The Pantech C150 is all of those things and seems to work great so far. The reception is much better and it has the exact features I need. Hopefully Mom and Tammy won’t constantly be asking “What?” anymore!
